name: U.R.A.N.I.U.M.
description:
Game Submission for LudumDare 49.

U.RA.N.I.U.M. aka Unstable reactors and nuclear incidents unsettles me.

Your house is located in the middle of four nuclear reactors. You need to protect your house by cooling unstable reactors and burying green nuclear waste underground.  Things get chaotic when 4 reactors are about to explode, and more and more waste appears to the ground.

Take your multitasking skill to a test, and try this game out.

Controls:

Move with WASD or arrows

Pick up and drop items with E

Use items with spacebar

Credits:

Code and other stuff: Tipu

Art and other stuff: monninen

Music, menu art and other stuff: Jokuihanvaan
